title: nArAyaNa naLinAyata
sahitya:
nArAyaNa naLinAyata lOcana namO namah pAhi pAhi lakSmi


anupallavi

  vArAmIshvara manjuLa talpa vana mAlAdhara mAdhava lakSmi


caraNam    mangaLakara karuNAkara shaurE vanaruha padayuga dIna sharaNyA
rangapura ramaNa sAmaja varadA rAmadAsanuta shrIdhara lakSmi
